installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# steamcmd Base Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
# Image to install with is 'ghcr.io/parkervcp/installers:debian'


## just in case someone removed the defaults.
if [[ "${STEAM_USER}" == "" ]] || [[ "${STEAM_PASS}" == "" ]]; then
    echo -e "steam user is not set.\n"
    echo -e "Using anonymous user.\n"
    STEAM_USER=anonymous
    STEAM_PASS=""
    STEAM_AUTH=""
else
    echo -e "user set to ${STEAM_USER}"
fi

## download and install steamcmd
cd /tmp
mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamcmd
curl -sSL -o steamcmd.tar.gz https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/client/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz
tar -xzvf steamcmd.tar.gz -C /mnt/server/steamcmd
mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamapps # Fix steamcmd disk write error when this folder is missing
cd /mnt/server/steamcmd

# SteamCMD fails otherwise for some reason, even running as root.
# This is changed at the end of the install process anyways.
chown -R root:root /mnt
export HOME=/mnt/server

## install game using steamcmd
./steamcmd.sh +force_install_dir /mnt/server +login ${STEAM_USER} ${STEAM_PASS} ${STEAM_AUTH} $( [[ "${WINDOWS_INSTALL}" == "1" ]] && printf %s '+@sSteamCmdForcePlatformType windows' ) +app_update ${SRCDS_APPID} $( [[ -z ${SRCDS_BETAID} ]] || printf %s "-beta ${SRCDS_BETAID}" ) $( [[ -z ${SRCDS_BETAPASS} ]] || printf %s "-betapassword ${SRCDS_BETAPASS}" ) ${INSTALL_FLAGS} validate +quit

## set up 32 bit libraries
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk32
cp -v linux32/steamclient.so ../.steam/sdk32/steamclient.so

## set up 64 bit libraries
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk64
cp -v linux64/steamclient.so ../.steam/sdk64/steamclient.so

## add below your custom commands if needed

## Specific to Unturned
cd /mnt/server/
ln -s ../../../steamcmd/linux64/steamclient.so Unturned_Headless_Data/Plugins/x86_64/steamclient.so
ln -s ../Extras/Rocket.Unturned/ Modules/

## install end
echo "-----------------------------------------"
echo "Installation completed..."
echo "-----------------------------------------"

variables.name: Steam App ID
variables.description: Steam App ID require for install and startup update

variables.name: ld lib path
variables.description: This is needed to load specific libraries

variables.name: Steam User
variables.description: Should be left blank for anon user

variables.name: GLST (Game Server Login Token)
variables.description: GSLTs are required by Smartly Dressed Games if you want to have your server accessible to others. Visit https://docs.smartlydressedgames.com/en/stable/servers/game-server-login-tokens.html

variables.name: Password
variables.description: Password for your Unturned server. This is applied when the game first starts. Plugins and the Commands.dat file can change this afterwards.

variables.name: Map
variables.description: The specific name of the map you wish to use. This variable is CASE-SENSITIVE.

variables.name: Perspective
variables.description: Sets the perspective that players can use while on the server (First/Third/Vehicle/Both).

variables.name: Difficulty
variables.description: Sets the difficulty level of your server (Easy/Normal/Hard). Per difficulty settings can be changed in the Config.json.

variables.name: Gamemode
variables.description: Sets the gamemode of your server (PvP/PvE). Can be overridden by plugins or the Commands.dat file.
